## Event Grid  
  
<!--823258d3-2ad7-4ece-a848-4343defcd94b_begin-->

#### Migrate to TLS 1.2 or above for Event Grid  
  
Support for TLS 1.0 and 1.1 on Event Grid is retiring. Update the TLS policy to the latest version.  
  
**Potential benefits**: Avoid service disruptions  

**Impact:** High
  
For more information, see [Azure updates](https://azure.microsoft.com/updates/v2/TLS-changes-for-Azure-Event-Grid)  

ResourceType: microsoft.eventgrid/domains  
Recommendation ID: 823258d3-2ad7-4ece-a848-4343defcd94b  
Subcategory: undefined
